'''''cerin''''' is a [[Sindarin]] word meaning "circular mound or artificial hill".<ref>{{HM|UI}}, p. 309</ref><ref>{{PE|17}}, p. 55</ref>
==Examples==
*''[[Cerin Amroth]]''
==See also==
*Sindarin ''[[haudh]]'' ("funeral mound")
